alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 2:13PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Diego County through 245 PM PDT... At 213 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Julian, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Julian, Cuyamaca Rancho State Park, Lake Cuyamaca, Hwy 79 Between Julian And Lake Cuyamaca, Hwy S1 Between Lake Cuyamaca And Mount Laguna, Hwy 78 Between Ramona And Santa Ysabel, Banner, Santa Ysabel, Wynola, Boulder Creek and Santa Ysabel Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
